üîä–í —ç—Ç–æ—Ç –¥–µ–Ω—å –º—ã –±—É–¥–µ–º –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞—Ç—å –æ —Ä–æ–ª–∏ –∂–µ–Ω—â–∏–Ω –≤ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è—Ö, –æ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –ø–æ–±–µ–¥–∞—Ö –∏ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –ø–æ—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è—Ö...–ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ç–∞–º–∏ –∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è –∏–∑ —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ –ø–æ–¥–µ–ª—è—Ç—Å—è, –∫–∞–∫ —è—Ä–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∏—Ü—ã –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–ª–∞ —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –º—É–∂—á–∏–Ω—ã –∂–µ–ª–∞—é—â–∏–µ –º–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞—Å –≤—ã–±–∏—Ä–∞—Ç—å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –Ω–∞—É–∫–∏, —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∏ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö —Å—Ç—É–¥–µ–Ω—Ç—ã, –Ω–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞—é—â–∏–µ –¥–µ–≤–µ–ª–æ–ø–µ—Ä—ã, –º–∏–¥–ª –∏ —Ç–æ–ø-–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–º–µ–Ω—Ç –ª–æ–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–π—Ç–∏ –º–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä –∫–ª–∞—Å—Åüë©‚Äçüíª

–î–∞–≤–∞–π—Ç–µ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å—É–ø–µ—Ä-–∂–µ–Ω—â–∏–Ω —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–µ —Å–ø–ª–æ—á—ë–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ, –≥–¥–µ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ –º—ã —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–µ–µ, —è—Ä—á–µ –∏ —É–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–µ!
‚†Ä
–ñ–µ–ª–∞—é—â–∏–µ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å —á–∞—Å—Ç—å—é –æ–≥—Ä–æ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞–π—Ç–µ—Å—å –Ω–∞ —Ö–µ—à—Ç–µ–≥ #TogetherWeRise –≤ Instagram, –≥–¥–µ –ø–æ—á—É–≤—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞–≤ –≥–æ—Ä–¥–æ—Å—Ç—å –∑–∞ –∂–µ–Ω—â–∏–Ω –≤ STEM —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –≤–æ–æ–¥—É—à–µ–≤–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å –Ω–∞ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è!
‚†Ä
"This is an affirmation to women that there is absolutely no gender specification on the type of carrer you want to pursue, be it on tope of a building, in the board room, in a design space, or the moon. You are equally as capable as the next person"

Women need technology-Technology needs women!

Women TechMakers Ashgabat is welcoming all interested people in tech who are passionate about empowering, connecting and inspire ladies to learn/improve and share their skills in technology...

The 1st time WTM Ashgabat is hosting a global event series to celebrate International Women's Day. This will be a day-long conference targeted towards increasing visibility, community and resources for women in technology.

Come and join our panel discussion, hands-on workshops, networking opportunities and all about contribution into closing the gender gap!

Check out how this WTM IWD global event is being organized throughout the world:
https://lnkd.in/eXEDgg2

events.name: Webinar: Static Website Generator tools - Jekyll, GatsbyJS, Netlify
events.description:
Our first online event is going to be conducted through the zoom.

The event will be hosted by Full-Stack Web Developer, Yazgeldi Seyidov

To learn more about him: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yazgeldi-seyidov/

He will be talking about some Open source Static HTML Website generator tools and some free HTML templates. How to use them, how to manipulate them.

Note:
Be ready with your
Internet-connected computer
VS Code text editor installed

The tools we need:
1) Download and install VSCode :

https://code.visualstudio.com/download

2) Try to set up an Integrated Development Environment (IDE), we will be running our code in the Linux terminal:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cvrqmq9A3tA&list=PLrRAOD5_Nx2Bs00-_1ClaDsXB7_dzh0k6&index=24&t=10s

Setup guide for MAC:
https://help.learn.co/en/articles/900121-mac-osx-manual-environment-set-up

The websites to visit to get familiar with:

1.https://www.netlify.com/

2.https://jekyllrb.com/

3. https://www.gatsbyjs.org/

4. https://github.com/

Join Zoom Meeting:
Meeting ID:[masked]

https://us04web.zoom.us/j/7268689906

events.name: Flutter Tutorials Session & Firebase Study Jam '20

venue.name: International University for Humanities and Development

events.description:
Speakers Erkin Ovlyagulyyev & Kakajan Shagylyjov will guide you with the introduction to Flutter & Firebase. You will have a chance to attend our first live code event in this developer space.

- The Flutter tutorials Session teaches you how to use the Flutter framework to build mobile applications for iOS and Android.
- Firebase is Google‚Äôs mobile app development platform for iOS, Android, and mobile web developers. Firebase gives you functionality like analytics, databases, messaging and crash reporting so you can move quickly and focus on your users.

Choose from the following:

Building layouts
How to build layouts using Flutter‚Äôs layout mechanism. Once you‚Äôve learned basic principles, you‚Äôll build the layout for a sample screenshot.
Adding interactivity to your Flutter app
You‚Äôll extend the simple layout app created in ‚ÄúBuilding Layouts in Flutter‚Äù to make an icon tappable. Different ways of managing a widget‚Äôs state are also discussed.
Animations in Flutter
Explains the fundamental classes in the Flutter animation package (controllers, Animatable, curves, listeners, builders), as it guides you through a progression of tween animations using different aspects of the animation APIs.

Agenda:
14:00 ‚Äì 14:15 Opening
14:15 ‚Äì 14:30 Intro to Developer Community programs
14:30 ‚Äì 14:40 Intro to Flutter and check Flutter environment setup
14:40 ‚Äì 15:30 CodeLab ‚Äì Build an app
15:30 ‚Äì 16:00 Firebase Tutorials Session
16:00 ‚Äì 16:10 Activity 1
16:10 ‚Äì 16:30 Application for Brain Development
16:30 ‚Äì 16:50 React Native Localization Abstraction
16:50 ‚Äì 17:00 Activity 2
17:00 ‚Äì 17:20 Chromium and Electron
17:20 ‚Äì 17:40 3ds Max Modeling Theory
17:40 ‚Äì 18:00 Meetup wrap-up, closing comments, and Networking

What you need to bring:
* Laptop with Xcode installed or use DartPad
* Programming knowledge (acquaint with the features of Flutter is a bonus)
events.how_to_find_us: Andalyp 169, International University for the Humanities and Development, Ashgabat, Turkmenistan

events.name: Enrichment Webinar Sessions. Lessons of Leadership from the Wizard of Oz.
events.description:
GDG Ashgabat is inviting you for Enrichment Webinar Series -Online Night Talks! üåöüåõ
‚†Ä
Curious about leadership skills? This night talk guest speaker Allamyrat Tuyliyev is happy to give you some Lessons of Leadership from the Wizard of Oz‚ú¥Ô∏è
‚†Ä
This presentation about the key elements of leadership that can be learned from the 1939 American musical fantasy "The Wizard of Oz", and the importance of "knowledge", "empathy", and "bravery" in a world of modern technology and groundbreaking innovations.
‚†Ä
Allamyrat Tuyliyev is Cybersecurity specialist, working in Dallas, TX. More information about Allamyrat career is in hiz LinkedIn profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/allamyrat

From coordinating a Youth Power Center at the age of 15, to leading the Student Government Association as it‚Äôs President, Allamyrat has seen and done it all. Allamyrat believes that leadership skill is nothing, but a magic wand that can be used in life and career.
‚†Ä
Outside of work, Allamyrat loves building large gaming computers with his son. Spending most of his time in Midwest, Allamyrat had an opportunity to connect the dots between innovative technology and successful leadership, and is excited to share it all!

Link for joining Live Night Talk broadcast session is:https://youtu.be/VoBeVrOqAkI

‚ö†Ô∏èMessage us if you would like to have a joined session or have no options to attend...

events.name: Introduction to GitHub
events.description:
Hey folks! Wanna hangout? Ahmet Tachmuradov and Yazgeldi Seyidov will be with us "Hanging out with GitHub!":)
‚†Ä
They're inviting you to talk about world‚Äôs leading software development platform - GitHub, where you can discover well & liitle-known, unknown, wrong & correctly-known feauture and learning and so on...
‚†Ä
Millions of developers around the world together discover, share, and build better software using GitHub. This webinar will help you to find answers to questions such as:
‚†Ä
‚úÖ what is GitHub?
‚úÖ how to get started?
‚úÖ why is it important to use GitHub?
‚†Ä
Join us if you're not acquainted with GitHub yet or just new starter developers/software engineers!
‚†Ä
Yazgeldi, software engineer graduate, passionate about Front-End Web Development, JavaScript, React, Gatsby, Jekyll, etc...
‚†Ä
Ahmet is pursuing his Master‚Äôs degree in Software Engineering and works as a Graduate Assistant at Lewis University, Romeoville, Illinois.
Enjoys exploring, learning and creating...also interested in sociology and history.
‚†Ä

youtu.be/cboFsHGcVPU

events.name: Should we switch to Kotlin?
events.description:
–í—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–∞–π—Ç–µ, –Ω–∞—à–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–∏–≥–ª–∞—à–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–ø–∏–∫–µ—Ä–∞ –Ω–∞ –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–æ–π –≤–µ–±–∏–Ω–∞—Ä Women Techmakers Tech Talk -–ö—ã—Ä–º—ã–∑—ã –ö–∞–ª–∏–µ–≤–∞!

–ö—ã—Ä–º—ã–∑—ã- Senior Android —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ —Å–∏–Ω–≥–∞–ø—É—Ä—Å–∫–æ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ Cartrack. –û—á–µ–Ω—å –ª—é–±–∏—Ç Android —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É –∏ —è–∑—ã–∫ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Kotlin.
–ö—ã—Ä–º—ã–∑—ã –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞–ª–∞ –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–ª–æ—â–∞–¥–∫–∞—Ö –≤ –°–∏–Ω–≥–∞–ø—É—Ä–µ, –ú–∞–ª–∞–π–∑–∏–∏ –∏ –í—å–µ—Ç–Ω–∞–º–µ –Ω–∞ Google –∏–≤–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Öüìç
‚†Ä
–ü–æ–±–ª–∏–∂–µ –ø–æ–∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º–∏—Ç—å—Å—è —Å –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–æ–π –ö—ã—Ä–º—ã–∑—ã, –≤—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –∑–∞–≥–ª—è–Ω—É–≤ –≤ –µ—ë –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å –≤ –õ–∏–Ω–∫–µ–¥–∏–Ω: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kyrmyzykaliyeva ,
–≥–¥–µ –ö—ã—Ä–º—ã–∑—ã —Å —Ä–∞–¥–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∏—Ç –Ω–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å—É—é—â–∏–µ –≤–∞—Å –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã, –∞ –≤—ã –≤ —Å–≤–æ—é –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥—å —Å–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å –µ—ë —Å–∫–∏–ª–ª—Å —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–Ω–æ –≤–∞—à–µ–≥–æ –≤–ø–µ—á–∞—Ç–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ —Ç–æ–º –∂–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∞–π–ª–µ...
‚†Ä
–ê —Ç–µ–º–∞ —ç—Ç–æ–π –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–∏ "–°—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –ª–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –Ω–∞ Kotlin‚ùì"

upcoming.name: The Age of AI
upcoming.description:
Who gets excited when hearing about ‚ÄúAI?‚Äù Sci-fi films like "terminator", "avengers" might come to mind when you hear the term "AI". These films may not seem realistic, but there is a chance it might get to be real in the near future.

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is taking the center of the 4th industrial revolution, and it is being applied to various applications such as Intelligent Robots, self-driving cars, AI speakers, IoT devices, etc. In this talk, the basic concepts of AI and Big Data will be introduced. We will talk about the pros and cons of using AI systems, how it got this enormous attention, which industries and companies are using it, and its possible effects on the way we live in the future. Their importance and benefits for businesses will be discussed too.

Target Audience:
Anyone who is interested in technology, computer science, or business.

________________________Turkmen

upcoming.name: Machine Learning Study Jam #1
upcoming.description:
New to machine learning but don't know where to start?

Our guest speaker from Bucharest KERIMBERDI AGAYEV -Application Support Specialist at "ORTEC/Optimize your world" is happy to invite you for a Machine Learning Study Jam where we will run through the Machine Learning Crash Course (MLCC)!

This course is intended for those who wish to learn about ML from a practical, applied perspective that will enable you to use machine learning in your everyday projects and learn about the power of TensorFlow. This is also a great opportunity for anyone with basic technical knowledge and limited Machine Learning knowledge willing to gain some practical experience in ML.

‚Ä¢ Understand what ML is all about
‚Ä¢ Getting started with TensorFlow
‚Ä¢ ML systems in real world
‚Ä¢ Demo time

Machine Learning Study Jam is a great opportunity to bring members of the community together to learn something new or advance their knowledge, with the help of a community facilitator. Skills learned in this workshop can be used for personal development or career advancement. The Machine Learning Study Jam would bring together a small group of members who are interested in learning about Machine Learning Crash. Join us for a Machine Learning Study Jam where we will be talking about Machine Learning basics to deployment!

upcoming.name: Machine Learning Study Jam #2
upcoming.description:
New to machine learning but don't know where to start?

Our guest speaker from Bucharest KERIMBERDI AGAYEV -Application Support Specialist at "ORTEC/Optimize your world" is happy to invite you for a Machine Learning Study Jam where we will run through the Machine Learning Crash Course (MLCC)!

For the second session you will be involved in building Face Recognition web app using Tensor Flow Javascript
from scratch and see how web apps build, and how to use machine learning in your apps.

upcoming.name: Google Cloud Next '20 Extended & Cloud Study Jam '20
upcoming.description:
First Cloud Next Extended event in Asghabat.

We will learn together about the most exciting announcements of Google Cloud Next 2020, and follow with a Cloud Study Jam - a community-run study group for developers where we'll be taking on:
- From containerizing applications to data engineering, our Study Jam Bootcamp can be tailored to specific Cloud topics and skill levels. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner developer or interested in diving into Machine Learning, Kubernetes, Certification, IoT, or Security, there‚Äôs a track for you. Get official hands-on technical training at no cost, on a wide range of technologies and topics.

upcoming.name: DevFest '20 Ashgabat
upcoming.description:
DevFest'20 will be an event where we come together to learn from each other.

The motive is to create a local ecosystem of Developers and give them a platform to Interact and Network. We talk about various cutting-edge technologies.
